zircon-temporary-objects.description:
Description

Note
The
zircon-temporary-objects
check has been deprecated and will be removed
in 24th release of LLVM. Please use
fuchsia-temporary-objects
instead.
zircon-temporary-objects.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
